messageTemplate: #Greeting #firstName, and welcome to #company! Room #roomNumber is now ready for you. Enjoy your stay, and let us know if you need anything
Hello #firstName, hope all is well! Your room #roomNumber is ready for you! #company is welcoming you!

#Greeting #firstName #lastName,  your checkout time is scheduled for tomorrow 11:00 AM.
 Please let us know if you have any questions!

Dear #firstName #lastName. Welcome to the #company, your room number is #roomNumber. 
 Let us know if you have any questions
